articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: New Rocket Engine Could Cut Travel Time to Mars from Years to Months - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A private company is working with the American space agency NASA to develop a new rocket that could greatly reduce space travel times. The engine for such a rocket will be designed to possibly reduce the travel time between Earth and Mars from years to months…
articles.content:
A private company is working with the American space agency NASA to develop a new rocket that could greatly reduce space travel times.
